name: find
description: Finds the first occurrence of a substring in a string, from a specified start position. If substring is not in string, returns zero. The search is case-sensitive.

params.name: substring
params.description: The string you are looking for.

params.name: start
params.description: The position from which to start searching in the string

examples.title: Find apple in the string
examples.description: Returns the index of apple in the string.
examples.code: find("apple", "An apple a day keeps the doctor away.")
